Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your high standards. This product, valued at $12000 to you, offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that I believe will significantly enhance your experience. I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $11500. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a highly competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
